title: How to Garen for the seriously pro

embed.description: Garen is a very difficult champion to master, but if you follow this professional guide to playing Garen you'll find yourself climbing the ladder very quickly. I consulted 7 other very experienced players to get their professional opinion and used them to assist me in creating this video tutorial.

body:
This is a video tutorial that uses the experience of 8 professional players to bring you one amazingly serious guide to playing Garen.
Guides in the form of musical montage have proven to be the best for teaching players.

replies.body: Wish I'd seem this a month ago. As a Garen 1-30 main, I heartily approve. Superbly timed, especially the Garen v Garen.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=Eog3M16p,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-29T05:34:44.719+0000)
>
> Wish I'd seem this a month ago. As a Garen 1-30 main, I heartily approve. Superbly timed, especially the Garen v Garen.

Such amazing editing and music choice to make it fit really well. So good!

Thanks guys :D
I wanted to reply earlier, but I wasn't able to log in for a while.

I appreciate hearing such positive feedback.
You weren't very clear. When is the best time to /d in the baron pit?

It's tough to say. It all depends on who you're vsing, how you're building and how the game is going.
There's too many factors to be able to explain in a comment.
But mostly it just comes down to figuring it out. It's not something that can really be taught. This sort of thing comes from time and practice.
I think it should have ended with an ult.
dat last bit though... someone do something ELSE
